title: See. No. 5
brief_description: Cinemagazine items: 1. Modern motors replace prancing ponies - ball game with motorcycles. 2. Motor maniacs - motorcycle obstacle racing. 3. Daring daughters of destiny - women in obstacle race. 4. Lions at home - lion attending her young in a cage. 5. Wildest teamwork - lion-drawn carriage. 6. A duck? No, a lion. 7. Polite bears. 8. A cinnamon bear milk shake. 9. Jousting comes back - modern knights in armour revive medieval sport and kill. 10. Jousting - a strange sight in the peaceful Seine. 11. Angry waters - seas in a hurricane; waves lashing against ships. 12. Real scenes of a real drama - boats thrown against shore.
